Feel The Acceleration...

Wanna drive? Or maybe prefer to get strapped into the passenger seat? Just check our sport cars and let's GO!

Our Offer

The Track You're Gonna Race...

Motorsport venue opened in 2004 and used for drag racing, GP2 Series and the annual Bahrain Grand Prix of Formula 1. This fantastic Bahrain Circuit is waiting for you.

Bahrain International Circuit

The first Bahrain Grand Prix took place on 4 April 2004, making history as the first Formula One Grand Prix to be held in the Middle East.

  • Location: Sakhir, Bahrain
  • Capacity: 70 000
  • Length: 5.412 km
  • Race lap record: 1:30.252 (Germany Michael Schumacher, Ferrari, 2004)

Find The Experience That Suits You Most...

We have multiple plans so everyone will find something for themselves.

DRIVE ONE OF OUR CARS
F1 car is a special double-seater and unfortunately you cannot drive it on you own!
  • Admission fee: $399. – per person, VAT included
  • The Driving Experience is a full-day programme
  • It is possible to record your sessions with an on-board camera
  • Lunch included
Inquire Now
EXPERIENCE THE G-FORCES OF A RACING CAR
  • Admission fee: $99. – per person, VAT included
  • Subject to change in price and programme
  • Minimum age 12 years and minimum height 1.40m
Inquire Now
PARTICIPATE IN A REAL WHEEL-TO-WHEEL COMPETITION
  • Admission fee: $599. – per person, VAT included
  • The Super Experience is a full-day programme
  • I addition to normal Driving Experience you will attend a small qualification session and race with other participants
  • It is possible to record your sessions with an on-board camera
  • Lunch included
Inquire Now
TRY ALL OF OUR CARS
  • Admission fee: $1299. – per person, VAT included
  • The Gold Experience is a two-days programme
  • You can try out all of our cars and you will be trained for the race by ex-formula 1 drivers!
  • It is possible to record your sessions with an on-board camera
  • Lunch included
